entry.title: Notes on JMLR Paper: Numerical Analysis near Singularities in RBF Networks
entry.summary: The parameter space of most learning machines have singular regions where the Fisher information matrices degenerate. * A parameter space differs from a variable in a model is that they tend to represent inherent properties of a system. Source
entry.content: The parameter space of most learning machines have singular regions where the Fisher information matrices degenerate. * A parameter space differs from a variable in a model is that they tend to represent inherent properties of a system. Source
